modName: Push list of Skyrim male armour mods 2018
summary: 700+ links to most male armor mods hosted here, for easy access. You welcome!
descriptionHtml:
Details
========
Version: 1.0
Date: 03.03.2018
Category: Utilities
Author(s): Pushkatu
Source: https://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/89917
Requirements: Microsoft Office or OpenOffice/LibreOffice

Info:
https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/OpenOffice.org#Forks_and_derivative_software
https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/LibreOffice


Description/ reason why I made this
===========
Every time you search for "male" armor, all you get is a hole bunch of fe(male) armor mods as a result. There are currently 5000+ armor mods uploaded on www.nexusmods.com and that number is still growing. This list gives easier access to most male amour mods available, all with a few clicks.




Install
=======
Extract it's contents to your desktop( or any other location you want) and double click on the file.

Uninstall
=========

Just delete the file :)


Incompatibility
===============

!!!WARNING!!!

Incompatible with [b]trolo-lo-lolls[/b]! If you are not a troll then you'll have no problems using it.
[spoiler]
[img]https://media2.giphy.com/media/xXPa6zYzX0nfO/200w.gif[/img][/spoiler]

Known Issues or Bugs
====================
None!

History
=======
03.03.2018 - Initial release


Contact
=======

You can find me on the official Elder Scrolls forums as 'Pushkatu'
You can find me on www.nexusmods.com as 'Pushkatu'
You can send me an email here: pushkatu@yahoo.com

Credits
=======

Thanks to Bethesda for creating Skyrim.
Thanks to all the modders out there that make Skyrim a better game.
Thanks to Skyrimnexus.com for the a one-stop-shop resource for authors and players.
Thanks to LHammonds for the Readme Generator this file was based on.
Thanks....all.

Licensing/Legal
===============
This list is Nexus exclusive since all the listed mods are from this site.
Don't forget that each mod has it's own readme file or it should have. Reading only this won't help at all when installing the mods.
Some of these mods might not compatible with each other so don't blame me if it'll blow up your game.
Some of these mods are not lore friendly, but are still amazing mods.
Some of these mods might require other mods in order to work properly, mods that are not listed here so once again make sure you read each mod's readme.
I did not create any of these mods so all the credit goes to the authors. All I did was to make this list.
author: Pushkatu
